message: Answers collected successfully. Your company snapshot has been enriched with your preferences. 4 cards have been created.

company.name: Fylle AI
company.description: Fylle is an AI-powered content generation platform that helps businesses create high-quality, brand-consistent content at scale. The platform combines advanced LLMs with deep company context to generate authentic content that resonates with target audiences.

evidence.excerpt: Fylle helps businesses maintain brand consistency while scaling content production
Support for multiple LLM providers including OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google

audience.primary: B2B marketing teams and content managers in tech companies
pain_points: Difficulty maintaining brand consistency across content
Lack of scalability in content production
Challenge of keeping content authentic and engaging
desired_outcomes: Faster content creation without sacrificing quality
Consistent brand voice across all channels

style_guidelines: Focus on practical value and actionable insights

insights.positioning: Premium AI content platform for enterprise teams
recent_news: Partnership with leading content marketing agencies

clarifying_questions.question: What type of content do you primarily create or plan to create?
clarifying_questions.reason: Understanding your content focus helps us tailor the generation to your specific use case and format preferences.

clarifying_questions.question: Who is your primary target audience?
clarifying_questions.reason: Knowing your audience allows us to adjust tone, complexity, and messaging to resonate with the right people.

clarifying_questions.question: How would you describe your brand voice and tone?
clarifying_questions.reason: This ensures the generated content maintains consistency with your existing brand identity and communication style.

clarifying_answers.q2: B2B marketing teams and content managers in tech companies
